full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Title
Measuring Farm Credit Canada's Economic Impact Leveraging Statistics Canada's Input/Output Multipliers

#### Reference Number
PW-23-01026795
#### Solicitation Number
2022-CU-010
#### Date of Publication
February 20, 2023

#### Tender Close Date
March 17, 2023 at 16:00:00 CST, Saskatchewan

#### Category
Services

#### Contact Information
Name: Chris Ugochukwu
Email: [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca)

#### Tender Description
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking economic expertise to build a framework that assesses the economic impact of various lending initiatives. The framework will utilize Statistics Canada's input/output multipliers to evaluate the effects on GDP and jobs created by region, province, and sector. We require a simple empirical framework that can run various scenarios and lending initiatives, with the ability to adjust for future updates to the input/output tables.

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Schedule
- **RFP issue date**: February 17, 2023
- **Vendor questions accepted until**: February 24, 2023 at 14:00 CST
- **RFP closing date and time**: March 17, 2023 at 14:00 CST

#### Important Considerations
- This is a non-binding, competitive RFP process.
- FCC may cancel the RFP at any time.
- The procurement process allows for negotiation with vendors prior to awarding a contract.

#### Requesting the RFP Document
Interested parties should contact Chris Ugochukwu at [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca) to request a copy of the RFP document.

#### Background
FCC is Canada's leading agriculture and food lender, with a healthy loan portfolio of more than $47 billion. We provide flexible, competitively priced financing, management software, information, and knowledge specifically designed for the agriculture and food industry.

#### Requirements
Refer to Part 4 of the RFP for a complete list of requirements. The successful consultant will provide FCC with an empirical framework that meets the specified requirements. Note that this RFP document may be cancelled or modified at any time without prior notice. Thank you.

- **Simplified the text**: Removed redundant or unnecessary information to make the text easier to read and understand.
